blocks.name: unben
blocks.content: An unbounded set of positive integers is infinite. (Contributed by NM, 5-May-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm unben(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cn), wral(s0, cn, wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))), wbr(c0, cen, cn))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylancl(wa(wss(c0, cn), wral(s0, cn, wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))), wbr(c0, cen, cn), wbr(c0, cen, com), wbr(com, cen, cn))
  unbenlem(s0, s1, hs0, c0, cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat1), com))
  eqid(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat1), com))
  ensymi(com, cn)
  nnenom()
  entr(c0, com, cn)
  diff.cres.s(s0, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat1), com)
  diff.crdg.s(s0, cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.com.s(s0)
  diff.cres.s(s1, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat1), com)
  diff.crdg.s(s1, cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.com.s(s1)
}

thm unben(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℕ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0[<]s1)))→ c0[≅]ℕ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylancl((c0 ⊆ ℕ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0[<]s1))), c0[≅]ℕ, c0[≅]_om, _om[≅]ℕ)
  unbenlem(s0, s1, hs0, c0, (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0[+]1)), 1)|` _om))
  eqid((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0[+]1)), 1)|` _om))
  ensymi(com, cn)
  nnenom()
  entr(c0, com, cn)
  diff.cres.s(s0, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0[+]1)), 1), com)
  diff.crdg.s(s0, (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0[+]1)), nat1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, universe, (hs0[+]1))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.com.s(s0)
  diff.cres.s(s1, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0[+]1)), 1), com)
  diff.crdg.s(s1, (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0[+]1)), nat1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, hs0, universe, (hs0[+]1))

blocks.name: infpnlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ infpn . The smallest divisor (greater than 1) ` M ` of ` N ! + 1 ` is a prime greater than ` N ` . (Contributed by NM, 5-May-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm infpnlem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wi(wa(wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c1), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c1), cn)), wral(s0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(nat1, clt, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, cv(s0)), cn)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wral(s0, cn, wi(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(s0)), cn), wo(wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, co(cfv(cfa, c0), caddc, nat1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  jcad(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c1), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c1), cn)), wral(s0, cn, wi(wa(wbr(nat1, clt, cv(s0)), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, cv(s0)), cn)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wral(s0, cn, wi(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(s0)), cn), wo(wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))))

blocks.name: infpn
blocks.content: There exist infinitely many prime numbers: for any positive integer ` N ` , there exists a prime number ` j ` greater than ` N ` . (See ~ infpn2 for the equinumerosity version.) (Contributed by NM, 1-Jun-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm infpn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wrex(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cn, wi(wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, cv(s1)), cn), wo(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  infpnlem2(s0, s1, c0, co(cfv(cfa, c0), caddc, nat1))
  eqid(co(cfv(cfa, c0), caddc, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(cfa, c0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfa, c0)
  diff.cfa.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(cfa, c0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfa, c0)
  diff.cfa.s(s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm infpn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ → ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ,(c0[<]s0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ ℕ,((s0[÷]s1)∈ ℕ →(s1 = 1 ∨ s1 = s0))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  infpnlem2(s0, s1, c0, ((! ` c0)[+]1))
  eqid(((! ` c0)[+]1))
  diff.co.s(s0, (! ` c0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfa, c0)
  diff.cfa.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, (! ` c0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfa, c0)
  diff.cfa.s(s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

  nnnn0d(cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)))))

thm prmunb(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ → ∃(s0 ∈ Prime, c0[<]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(s0 ∈ Prime, c0[<]s0), c0 ∈ ℕ0)
  nnnn0(c0)
  mpd(c0 ∈ ℕ0, ∃(s0 ∈ Prime, c0[<]s0), ∃(s0 ∈ Prime, s0[||]((! ` c0)[+]1)))
  3syl(c0 ∈ ℕ0, ∃(s0 ∈ Prime, s0[||]((! ` c0)[+]1)), (! ` c0)∈ ℕ, ((! ` c0)[+]1)∈(ℤ≥ ` 2))
  sylbi((! ` c0)∈ ℕ, ((! ` c0)[+]1)∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), (! ` c0)∈(ℤ≥ ` 1))
  elnnuz((! ` c0))
  syl6eleqr(((! ` c0)[+]1), (ℤ≥ ` 2), (ℤ≥ `(1[+]1)), (! ` c0)∈(ℤ≥ ` 1))
  eluzp1p1((! ` c0), nat1)
  fveq2i(cuz, nat2, (1[+]1))
  df-2()
  exprmfct(s0, ((! ` c0)[+]1))
  reximdva(s0, cprime, c0 ∈ ℕ0, s0[||]((! ` c0)[+]1), c0[<]s0)
  sylibrd((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ s0 ∈ Prime), s0[||]((! ` c0)[+]1), c0[<]s0, ¬ s0[≤]c0)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ ℕ0, s0 ∈ Prime, (s0[||]((! ` c0)[+]1)→ ¬ s0[≤]c0))
  con2d((s0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ∈ ℕ0), s0[||]((! ` c0)[+]1), s0[≤]c0)
  sylbird((s0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ∈ ℕ0), s0[≤]c0, ¬ s0[||]((! ` c0)[+]1), c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0))
  syl2an(s0 ∈ Prime, c0 ∈ ℕ0, (c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)↔ s0[≤]c0), s0 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  nn0z(c0)
  eluz(s0, c0)
  adantr(s0 ∈ Prime, c0 ∈ ℕ0, (c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)→ ¬ s0[||]((! ` c0)[+]1)))
  ex(s0 ∈ Prime, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0), ¬ s0[||]((! ` c0)[+]1))
  syl31anc((s0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)), ¬ s0[||]((! ` c0)[+]1), (! ` c0)∈ ℤ, s0 ∈ ℕ, 1[<]s0, s0[||](! ` c0))
  3syl((s0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)), (! ` c0)∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ ℕ0, (! ` c0)∈ ℕ)
  sylancom(s0 ∈ Prime, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0), c0 ∈ ℕ0, s0 ∈ ℕ0)
  nnnn0d(s0, (s0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)))
  eluznn0(s0, c0)
  faccl(c0)
  nnz((! ` c0))
  simprd((s0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)), 1[<]s0, s0 ∈ ℕ)
  sylancom(s0 ∈ Prime, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0), s0[||](! ` c0), s0 ∈ ℕ)
  simpld((s0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)), s0 ∈ ℕ, 1[<]s0)
  adantr(s0 ∈ Prime, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0), (s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ 1[<]s0))
  sylib(s0 ∈ Prime, (s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ 1[<]s0), s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2))
  prmuz2(s0)
  eluz2b2(s0)
  dvdsfac(s0, c0)
  imp(((! ` c0)∈ ℤ ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ 1[<]s0), s0[||](! ` c0), ¬ s0[||]((! ` c0)[+]1))
  ndvdsp1((! ` c0), s0)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℕ0, s0 ∈ Prime, (c0[<]s0 ↔ ¬ s0[≤]c0), c0 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  nn0re(c0)
  zred(s0, s0 ∈ Prime)
  prmz(s0)
  ltnle(c0, s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, (! ` c0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfa, c0)
  diff.cfa.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
}
